title: Constantly being at your $3,000 Mastercard limit SUCKS
body:
Long story short, I had a roommate about a year and a half ago screw me over and move out without paying his share of the rent, so I was stuck with a $1,100 rent all by myself, rather than the usual split half way, and on top of that that's when my boss decided that 2-3 shifts a week was just fine for me.

My parents helped me out, but I have been paying them back slowly, but I had to use the crap out of my Mastercard during that rough patch and due to a crippling 20% interest rate, it's still going back to its limit because I can only manage minimum payments.

Money stress sucks, but hopefully I can use my tax return to pay off a chunk of it and get a bit of that weight off my shoulders.

Lesson of the day: KEEP YOUR CREDIT CARD PAID OFF. SERIOUSLY.
